===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# the [[Grand Canyon]]
# A short form for other canyons, such as the [[w:Yarlung Zangbo Grand Canyon|Yarlung Zangbo Grand Canyon]] ([[w:zh:雅魯藏布江大峽谷|雅魯藏布江大峽谷]]), the Guangdong Ruyuan Grand Canyon ([[w:zh:廣東乳源大峽谷|廣東乳源大峽谷]]) or the Ta-An River Canyon ([[w:zh:大安溪大峽谷|大安溪大峽谷]]) between [[Taichung]] and [[Miaoli]] counties in Taiwan.
